description: Disables command(s) for all channels in this server

detailedDescription.details: Disable commands from being used in this server. Great for reducing spammy commands. **Tip**: To restrict all commands, you can use the `--all` or `-a` flag!

noCommands: You need to specify which commands to restrict!
listRestrictions: The following commands are restricted: {{ commands }}
listRestrictionsEmpty: You don't have any command restrictions.
